name: foodsoft-shop
description: Shopping cart component for Foodsoft: web-based software to manage a non-profit food coop.

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production webpack -p && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css build/ && sed 's/node_modules.*bootstrap/bootstrap/' index.html > build/index.html

author: wvengen <dev-voko@willem.engen.nl>
